website_summaries.verdict: Worth considering if you are a fan of DevaCurl products and want to volumize waves and curls without harsh ingredients; but it's not ideal for all hair types.
pros: Earns praise for adding volume and taming frizz without containing alcohol, silicone, parabens, or sulfates
Gives hair a nice sheen, and defines waves and curls
cons: Doesn't work as well on tight curls and coils as it does weaves and loose curls
Some users gripe about it making their hair look stringy

customer_reviews.title: Devil Curl
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT use this brand. After two years of only using Deva Curl products, including this one, my hair was relaxed multiple curl types, and I still have a section in the back that’s straight. I lost about 1/3 of my hair, and my scalp felt burnt constantly. There’s a Facebook group called “Hair Damage & Hair Loss from DevaCurl - You’re not CRAZY or ALONE!” with 60k members, many of whom had worse damage than I did. Some have had to get steroid shots in their scalp to deal with damage, and many have chopped off most of their hair. -April

product_meta.title: DevaCurl Frizz-Free Volumizing Texture Foam, 7.5oz
feature_bullets: Frizz-free volumizing foam: The DevaCurl Volumizing Foam provides fullness plus frizz protection. This airy, boosting foam mousse will be your new go-to hair styler. This lightweight foam works well with wavy, curly, and super curly hair types.

Touchable definition & shine: Use this airy foam to get curl definition, and light, shiny curls. This foam nourishes delicate curls and boosts spirals while reducing frizz and flyaways. Use this foam to get bouncy, non-crunchy curls.

Easy to use: Pump the foam into your palm; rub hands together and scrunch all over wet curls and roots in an upward motion. Hold, pause and release as you scrunch. Focus on your roots for more lift and volume.
Energetic scent: Bright and energetic, Frizz-Free Volumizing Foam captures the freshness of Lemon & Lime Zest.
Devacurl promise: All DevaCurl products are 100% sulfate, paraben and silicone-free. They are also vegan, wheat, and cruelty-free.
